title: Bug 3666: Hungry code assist
description: Under certain circumstances, code assist eats too much code. Consider the enclosed class. As a programmer, I must add a parameter to the `baz` call in `bar` to make the program correct.
OB: The code is currently `baz(x.foo())` in the `bar` method.
EB: The code should be changed to `baz(x.foo().foo())` in the `bar` method.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Change the `baz` call to `baz(x.x.foo())`.
2. Place the cursor after the first `x.`.
3. Press Ctrl+Space to bring up code assist.
4. Type `f` to filter the list.
5. Select `foo()`.
